channel.name: Why are some balance APIs in snarkyjs typed as UInt64, and some as Int64?

messages.content: Is negative balance possible in the current L1 protocol?
Yes but how does that make sense? Question is if the balance can be negative or not
and balanceChange on AU is Int64 i think
Yes, Int64 is just a UInt64 plus a Sign object. So balanceChange says if you increment or decrement the account's balance. But if you go below 0 your AU will fail
sorry, i got it mixed up
Or do you mean as an intermediate value?
no sorry i should probably stop programing for today
i mixed up unsigned and signed
I'd actually be very curious if you could have a negative balance in-between some AUs in an transaction
